name: Notice.AAA6.CP.HearingFee.HWF.PartRemission
titleEn: Your help with fees application has been reviewed
titleCy: Mae eich cais am help i dalu ffioedd wedi cael ei adolygu
descriptionEn: You'll get help with the hearing fee. ${hearingFeeRemissionAmount} will be covered by fee remission. You must still pay the remaining fee of ${hearingFeeOutStandingAmount} by ${hearingDueDateEn}. You can pay by phone by calling {civilMoneyClaimsTelephone}. If you do not pay, your claim will be struck out.
descriptionCy: Byddwch yn cael help gyda ffi'r gwrandawiad. Bydd ${hearingFeeRemissionAmount} yn cael ei gyflenwi gan ddileu ffi. Rhaid i chi dal dalu'r ffi sy'n weddill o ${hearingFeeOutStandingAmount} erbyn ${hearingDueDateCy}. Gallwch dalu dros y ff√¥n drwy ffonio {civilMoneyClaimsTelephone}. Os na fyddwch yn talu, bydd eich hawliad yn cael ei ddileu.
